scripts.delete-subgraph: goldsky subgraph webhook delete filament-v1-webhook && goldsky subgraph webhook delete filament-v1-webhook2 && goldsky subgraph webhook delete filament-v1-webhook3 && goldsky subgraph webhook delete filament-v1-webhook4 && goldsky subgraph webhook delete filament-v1-webhook5 && goldsky subgraph delete filament-sei/v1
scripts.webhook: goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook --entity update_position --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
scripts.webhook2: npm run webhook && goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook2 --entity deposited --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
scripts.webhook3: npm run webhook2 && goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook3 --entity with_draw --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
scripts.webhook4: npm run webhook3 && goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook4 --entity unstaked --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
scripts.webhook5: npm run webhook4 && goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook5 --entity liquidity_removed --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
scripts.webhook6: npm run webhook5 && goldsky subgraph webhook create filament-sei/v1 --name filament-v1-webhook6 --entity staked --url https://orderbookv3.filament.finance/webhook/
